overview: Angel Eyes was shot in the scenic wilds of Arizona. With the help of some local roughnecks, daredevils and bikers living in these long forgotten desert badlands, we turn up the heat and whip up the dust. "Viper Team" is led by Emma Mae, a sexy killer who can cause even the scorching sun to break out in cold sweat! Rugged roads are traveled, wicked souls chasing down dumptruck driving demons. Muscle cars, sand buggies, motorcycles... name your fantasy and we promise to fulfill with pleasure.
title: Angel Eyes
